Michigan State University's Official Hackathon

Spartahack VI

03/06/29 - 03/09/20

Applications open soon!

The weekend of March sixth we're bringing together students of all skill levels and disciplines with tech industry professionals at Michigan State University. Every year at Spartahack we provide a space to get creative with tech, make connections, and forget the words "I can't."

We're excited to see what you will create!

See Past Projects & Prizes!

Sponsor Spartahack

Our sponsors make it possible for Spartahack to host 1,000+ emerging developers, designers, and builders. Those who contribute to the event have the opportunity to help guide next generation of tech workers.


Interested in sponsoring?

Email us - hello@Spartahack.com
